item.description: Join special guests Todd Feinburg of WRKO and Loren Spivack, the Free Market Warrior, as we rally once again outside the office of Senator Scott Brown. Brown has indicated he is displeased with the final product Barney Frank and his committee have created - a Financial Reform bill that will stifle our still struggling economy. We will present Brown's staff with letters from tea party activists across the state. (Scroll down to sign a letter.) This will be our last opportunity to show Senator Brown that a NO vote on the bill will ensure the continued support of limited government, free market advocates across the Commonwealth.
item.name: Senator Brown - JUST VOTE NO! Rally
